TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StylusDownEventHandler(object sender, StylusDownEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StylusDownEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusDownEventArgs"> that contains the event data. .
Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.StylusDown?displayProperty=fullName> event, as well as several variations, including the corresponding Preview event. Also re-exposes the event in the base element classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Typically, this delegate corresponds to a routed event. Check the event data, in particular the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> property, to determine which element raised the event.
